traits.description: Timmy enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. he can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.
traits.name: nudist

traits.description: Timmy gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. he is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.
traits.name: bloodlust

traits.description: Timmy is an exceptionally agreeable and giving person. he never insults others and will sometimes offer kind words to brighten the moods of those around him. he also never judges people by their appearance. his agreeableness also makes him more likely to conform to prevailing opinions.
traits.name: kind

traits.description: Timmy has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother him at all. he doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects him. he also feels no mood boost from socializing.
traits.name: psychopath

traits.description: Timmy was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, he tried it... and he liked it.
traits.name: cannibal

traits.description: Timmy always says exactly what's on his mind, especially if it's bugging him. That tends to rub people the wrong way. At least he doesn't mind being insulted or slighted either.
traits.name: abrasive

traits.description: Timmy is too smart for his own good. he learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.
traits.name: toosmart

traits.description: Timmy likes to fight up close and personal. his accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but he'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
traits.name: brawler

traits.description: For Timmy, there's something exciting about getting hurt. he doesn't know why, he's just wired differently.
traits.name: masochist

traits.description:
Timmy likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

he gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

he doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.
traits.name: nightowl

traits.description: Timmy needs a really impressive bedroom. he gets a mood loss if he doesn't get what he wants.
traits.name: greedy

traits.description: For Timmy, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. he gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom. At least he isn't as affected by prisoners or colonists dying and he doesn't mind wearing a dead person's clothing.
traits.name: jealous

traits.description: Timmy has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. he will become unhappy if he has a bedroom that's too impressive. he also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. he never judges others by their appearance.
traits.name: ascetic

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of his own gender.
traits.name: gay

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to both men and women.
traits.name: bisexual

traits.description: Timmy has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.
traits.name: asexual

traits.description: Timmy's voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and he tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike him.
traits.name: annoyingvoice

traits.description: Timmy breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.
traits.name: creepybreathing

traits.description: Timmy loves fire. he will never extinguish fires. To relieve stress, he will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. This happens more often if his mood is low. Somehow this fascination with fire leads to a lot more inspiration.
traits.name: pyromaniac

traits.description: Timmy is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize him. At least he is really good at running and for whatever reason seems to be nearly immune to toxic substances.
traits.name: wimp

traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. he seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: nimble

traits.description: Timmy has a knack for learning. he picks things up much faster than others.
traits.name: fastlearner

traits.description:
Timmy has never learned how to learn. The motivation and talent is there, he just needs time and patience. 

    Each skill point increases global learning factor by 2%
traits.name: slowlearner

traits.description: Timmy has no need to experience the outdoors or light. he will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever, no matter how long he stays inside, and is not bothered by darkness.
traits.name: undergrounder

traits.description: Timmy feels limited in his feeble human body. he often dreams of being enhanced by artificial body parts.
traits.name: bodymodder

traits.description: Timmy believes the human body is limited for a reason. To him, artificial body parts are unethical and disgusting.
traits.name: bodypurist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts men.
traits.name: misandrist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts women.
traits.name: misogynist

traits.description: Timmy has a fantastic memory for detail. he will lose unused skills at half the rate of other people.
traits.name: greatmemory

traits.description: Timmy has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. he takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. he stands solid like a rock, and equally unmovable.
traits.name: tough

traits.description: Timmy feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. he will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break.
traits.name: torturedartist

traits.description: Timmy's life revolves around food. he gets hungry quickly but also eats faster, cooks faster and knows his ingredients, barely ever causing food poisoning.
traits.name: gourmand

traits.description: Timmy doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether he's sleeping on a bed or on the ground, he will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.
traits.name: quicksleeper

traits.description: Timmy is always falling behind the group whenever he goes anywhere.
traits.name: slowpoke

traits.description: Timmy likes to be where he's going. he walks quicker than most people.
traits.name: fastwalker

traits.description: Timmy always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.
traits.name: jogger

traits.description: Timmy has an intense fascination with chemical sources of enjoyment. he will consume much more of them and, if not already addicted to any drug and satisfied, will sometimes go on hard drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use pleasurable drugs. If there is one upside to this it's all the inspiration one can get from drugs.
traits.name: chemicalfascination

traits.description: Timmy has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. he will consume more of them and, if not already addicted to any drug and satisfied, will sometimes go on social drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use pleasurable drugs. If there is one upside to this it's all the inspiration one can get from drugs.
traits.name: chemicalinterest

traits.description: Timmy abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals, and avoids alcohol and pleasurable drugs. he is a hard working individual.
stats: Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.

traits.name: teetotaler

traits.description: Timmy is just naturally upbeat about his situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
traits.name: sanguine

traits.description: Timmy is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get him down.
traits.name: optimist

traits.description: Timmy tends to look on the bad side of life.
traits.name: pessimist

traits.description: Timmy is perenially unhappy. he has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine. his only way to deal with it is hiding in his room or wandering around in sadness.
traits.name: depressive

traits.description: Timmy's will is an iron shield. he keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
traits.name: iron-willed

traits.description: Timmy is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
traits.name: steadfast

traits.description: Timmy tends to crack under pressure.
traits.name: nervous

traits.description: Timmy is on a hair-trigger all the time. he is the first to break in any tough situation. If that happens he will find something to smash.
traits.name: volatile

traits.description: Timmy likes to have things squared away. he will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but his random mood swings can get the better of him.
traits.name: neurotic

traits.description: Timmy feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. he will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but his random mood swings can easily get the better of him.
traits.name: veryneurotic

traits.description: Timmy has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.
traits.name: industrious

traits.description: Timmy is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
traits.name: hardworker

traits.description: Timmy is a little bit lazy.
traits.name: lazy

traits.description: Timmy loves idleness and hates anything productive. he moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.
traits.name: slothful

traits.description: Timmy's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. he is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallyhypersensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallysensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is psychically out of tune with others. he isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydull

traits.description: Timmy's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. he just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydeaf

traits.description: Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. he shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
traits.name: carefulshooter

traits.description: Pew! Pew! Pew! Timmy just likes pulling the trigger. he shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
traits.name: trigger-happy

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to him before he even opens his mouth.
traits.name: beautiful

traits.description: Timmy has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like him.
traits.name: pretty

traits.description: Timmy is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions. If there is an upside to this than that no one minds if his face has a scar or two.
traits.name: ugly

traits.description: Timmy is staggeringly ugly. his face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at him while conversing. If there is an upside to this than that no one minds if his face has a scar or two... or ten.
traits.name: staggeringlyugly

traits.description: Timmy has a naturally powerful immune system. he will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.
traits.name: super-immune

traits.description: Timmy has an awful immune system. he gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.
traits.name: sickly

traits.description: Timmy has had proper training with ranged weapons. he shoots accurately and quickly.
traits.name: expertshooter

traits.description: Timmy enjoys the solitude and tranquility inherent to long fishing sessions. he will prefer fishing above other activities.
traits.name: fisherman

traits.description: Timmy is entombed in a warcasket. No amount of pain will have an effect on them, and they can never go into a pain shock or drop unconscious due to pain. Because of how bulky the armor is and how much energy it takes to use it, Timmy is not capable of doing any work.
traits.name: warcasket

traits.description: Timmy was entombed in a warcasket, and then brutally pulled out of one. The neural and nerve damage from being unplugged is so severe that Timmy is in constant, agonizing pain and can barely assemble his thoughts. Only installing Timmy back in a warcasket can cure the symptoms.
traits.name: shellcasket

traits.description: Timmy hates and distrusts xenos. They see them as little more than animals.
traits.name: xenophobe

traits.description: Timmy thinks aliens are exotic and interesting. They would love to get to know them more and wouldn't mind forming relationships with them.
traits.name: xenophile

traits.description: NAME is an artificially simulated recreation of a person who died.
traits.name: holographic

traits.description: Timmy's mind is awaken to the psychic maelstrom.
traits.name: psionic

traits.description: Timmy has a lot of creative power. he is very good at making unique works of art, as well as discovering new ways of solving problems.
traits.name: creative(outdated)

traits.description: Timmy can't die.
traits.name: immortal

traits.description: Timmy has seen a lot of death and pain. he's not a true psycopath and can enjoy socialization, but he's also not affected by the suffering of others.
traits.name: indifferent

traits.description: Timmy prefers to stay alone - and is very good at that.
traits.name: lonewolf

traits.description: Timmy is a crackshot with a gun - or any ranged weapon for that matter.
traits.name: gunslinger

traits.description: Timmy is skilled at fighting in close-quarters.
traits.name: duelist

traits.description: Timmy is very brave and quite hard to kill.
traits.name: meatshield

traits.description: Timmy has a heavy hand to deliver pain to the enemies.
traits.name: fighter

traits.description: Timmy is very good at building structures, furniture and machinery.
traits.name: mason

traits.description: Timmy is really good at working with animals.
traits.name: shepherd

traits.description: Timmy is good at hunting the big game, and can also train animals for various tasks.
traits.name: hunter

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled crafter, and can work both fast and skillfully.
traits.name: crafter

traits.description: Timmy has a deep understanding of art and beauty.
traits.name: artisan

traits.description: Timmy is good at taking care of wounds and diseases.
traits.name: nurse

traits.description: Timmy has a deep understanding of the body and can perform surgeries with higher accuracy and speed.
traits.name: surgeon

traits.description: Timmy is a great cook and can make really delicious dishes.
traits.name: chef

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled miner, and knows how to work with minerals.
traits.name: miner

traits.description: Timmy is very charismatic and can bend other people to their will.
traits.name: diplomat

traits.description: Timmy is quite smart, and can research faster as well as working with medical chemistry.
traits.name: scientist

traits.description: Timmy is very intelligent and can research really fast.
traits.name: researcher

traits.description: Timmy is good at working with plants, cutting down trees and harvesting crops.
traits.name: herbalist

traits.description: Timmy has a strong back, and can move fast even while carrying weight.
traits.name: hauler

traits.description: Timmy has a frail back so he can't carry as much as the average person.
traits.name: frailback

traits.description: Timmy has a strong back which allows him to carry more than most people.
traits.name: strongback

traits.description: Timmy has a very strong back or is part mule or something. he can carry twice as much as a normal person.
traits.name: verystrongback

traits.description: Timmy has a passion for animals. he gets bonuses to all animal interactions.
traits.name: animalfriend

traits.description: Timmy is still human, mostly. he is immune to the effects of toxic fallout but their ghoulish appearance makes interacting with others difficult.
traits.name: ghoulish

traits.description: Timmy's body has built up a resistance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.
traits.name: radresistant

traits.description: There's no time to waste! Timmy has increased movement and work speed.
traits.name: actionboy

traits.description: There's no time to waste! Timmy has increased movement and work speed.
traits.name: actiongirl

traits.description: Timmy has quick hands. When it comes to his hands, Timmy never hesitates.
traits.name: quickhands

traits.description: Timmy isn't stupid! he is just... different. he learns twice as fast but works slower than normal, he is also incapable handling some tasks.
traits.name: idiotsavant

traits.description: Timmy has a charismatic personality. he gets bonuses to all human-like social interactions.
traits.name: charismatic

traits.description: Timmy has a very charismatic personality. he gets bonuses to all human-like social interactions.
traits.name: verycharismatic

traits.description: Timmy is a gun nut, he loves guns. he gets a mood bonus while holding a ranged weapon.
traits.name: gunnut

traits.description: Timmy is part tree! he can really take a beating!
traits.name: rooted

traits.description: Timmy has an intimidating personality, this gives him an advantage in social interactions.
traits.name: intimidating

traits.description: Timmy has a very intimidating personality, this gives him a big advantage in social interactions.
traits.name: veryintimidating

traits.description: Timmy is good at working with scrap metal. he is great with a smelter and is efficient when using building materials.
traits.name: scrapper

traits.description: Timmy seems to discover hidden wealth where ever he goes.
traits.name: fortunefinder

traits.description: Timmy has poor hand-eye coordination and will miss his target more often in combat.
traits.name: pooraim

traits.description: Timmy has great hand-eye coordination and will miss his target less often in combat.
traits.name: steadyaim

traits.description: Timmy has good reflexes and moves with finesse. he will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
traits.name: agile

traits.description: Timmy has great reflexes and moves like a ninja. he will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
traits.name: ninja-like

traits.description: Timmy isn't very smart. he can mess up doing just about anything.
traits.name: stupid

traits.description: Timmy is smarter than average. he learns faster and has a good understanding of the world around him.
traits.name: intelligent

traits.description: Timmy is very smart. he learns faster and has a great understanding of the world around him.
traits.name: veryintelligent

traits.description: Timmy isn't very aware of his surroundings, or anything at all really. he
traits.name: oblivious

traits.description: Timmy has a good awareness of his surroundings and has a good understanding of how his actions affects others.
traits.name: perceptive

traits.description: Timmy is very aware of his surroundings and has a great understanding of how his actions affects others.
traits.name: veryperceptive

traits.description: Timmy knows how to scavenge and gather for resources quickly.
traits.name: scrounger

traits.description: Timmy has good health and an enduring personality. he is better at handling stressful situations than others.
traits.name: enduring

traits.description: Timmy has exceptional health and a very enduring personality. he is capable of handling high stress situations that others cannot.
traits.name: veryenduring

traits.description: Timmy is a Vulpian, and he is absolutely adorable, as expected from gene-engineered servitor. Even animals are attracted by his adorable appearence. Even plants start to bloom around Timmy!
traits.name: vulpian

traits.description: Timmy is a Lombax. he has an incredible natural inclination towards Crafting, Engineering and Combat just like other representatives of his species. But due to natural inclination of Lombaxes to solve all problems with brute force, Timmy is not very good in "Social" things.
traits.name: lombax

traits.description: Timmy is a Braixen. Timmy has an incredible natural inclination towards psionics and manipulation of life essence. he can easily read emotions of humans, animals and even plants.
traits.name: braixen

traits.description: Timmy is a Delphox. Timmy is a powerful psychic and is inclined towards manipulation of life essence. he can easily read emotions of humans, animals and even plants.
traits.name: delphox

traits.description: Timmy is a Kisalfar. While Kisalfar are "inferior" compared to Fressalfar in terms of intelligence, they're incredibly good in "social" things and negotiations.
traits.name: kisalfar

traits.description: Timmy is a Fressalfar. Timmy is just like a Thrumbo that is hidden in his DNA - Highly Intelligent and not really Social. It is very hard to approach him and start a conversation.
traits.name: fressalfar

traits.description: Timmy is a Cheetah. Timmy is a great runner with a sharp sight. However, just like most Feline species, he is not a very Social being.
traits.name: cheetah

traits.description: Timmy is a Leo. Timmy is a great natural predator with sharp sight and is rather Social, compared to other Feline species.
traits.name: leo

traits.description: Timmy is a Jaguar. Timmy is a great natural predator with sharp sight. However, just like most Feline species, he is not a very Social being.
traits.name: jaguar

traits.description: Timmy is a Panther. Timmy is a great natural predator with sharp sight. However, just like most Feline species, he is not a very Social being.
traits.name: panther

traits.description: Timmy is a Tigris. Timmy is a great natural predator with sharp sight. However, just like most Feline species, he is not a very Social being.
traits.name: tigris

traits.description: Timmy is a Sylveon, and he is absolutely adorable, as expected from gene-engineered servitor. Sylveons were gene-engineered to be a productive workers at assembly line and basic principles of Crafting are embedded in their DNA.
traits.name: sylveon

traits.description: Timmy is uncommonly agile and stealthy, with better reflexes and a more flexible body than most.
traits.name: stealthy

traits.description:
Timmy has a special connection to animals and understands them better than most people. Animals also tend to understand what he wants from them. The time he spends with animals is long, but worth it.

    Taming never causes manhunter
    Easier taming of very wild animals
traits.name: animalfriend

traits.description:
Timmy is proficient with various construction materials, particularly stone. he will construct anything out of stone three times as fast as others and smooth out your rocky base in no time.

    Stone construction speed +200%
traits.name: architect

traits.description:
Timmy has a unique approach to science. he always thinks outside the box and finds inspiration for intellectual problems in art.

    Artistic increases research speed
traits.name: creativethinker

traits.description: Timmy seems to have rented all the good fortune on this Rimworld.
traits.name: fortunate

traits.description:
Timmy has a special talent to grow plants and nurture them even in hostile enviroments. he can grow any plant, even if other people would fail due to their lack of skills. he would like some plants in his bedroom.

    Can grow any plant regardless of skill
traits.name: greenthumb

traits.description: Timmy is a gun nut, his life revolves around guns, how they are crafted, maintained and used. Quite a handy skill in these circumstances. Just don't hand him a melee weapon.
traits.name: gunnut

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally coordinated with his hands.
traits.name: hand-eyecoordination

traits.description: Timmy has a keen eye and can spot even tiny mineral deposits. he will occassionally find small clumps of resources when mining any sort of stone or ore. Chance increased for flatter terrain.
traits.name: keeneye

traits.description:
Timmy has had their fair share of encounters with mechanoids. he has become an expert in mechanoid construction and combat, making him uniquely suited to disassemble and fight them.

    Damage versus mechanoids +50%
traits.name: mechanoidexpert

traits.description:
Timmy wants thing to be exactly right. This does take time, but the results speak for themselves.

    Quality level +1 (50% chance)
traits.name: perfectionist

traits.description: Timmy knows exactly the right words for every situation. This also means his insults hurt more.
traits.name: silvertongue

traits.description:
Timmy has particularly steady hands, which don't even tremble in dire circumstances or when he himself is injured.

    No self-tend penalty
traits.name: steadyhands

traits.description: Timmy has a very strong back or is part mule or something. he can carry significantly more as a normal person.
traits.name: strongback

traits.description: Either the body or mind of Timmy is one of insight and experience. While some find them old fashioned, others will respect their guidance.

data.mod: Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures

traits.name: elder

traits.description: Timmy has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. he takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. he is extremely hard to kill.
traits.name: tough

traits.description: Timmy has dominant human blood which supresses more savage Dragon blood.
traits.name: humanblooded

traits.description: Timmy gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. he is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.
traits.name: bloodlust

traits.description: Timmy likes to fight up close and personal. his accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but he'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
traits.name: brawler

traits.description: Timmy is naturally good at shooting things from afar. he can fight in close combat, but would prefer not to.
traits.name: talent:bowman

traits.description: Timmy is handy with a sword. he has some skills with a bow, but prefers to fight up close and personal.
traits.name: talent:swordsman

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled builder. he knows how to build all sorts of buildings and furnitures.
traits.name: talent:builder

traits.description: Timmy spends a lot of time examining rocks. he is rather good at spotting valuable minerals.
traits.name: talent:miner

traits.description: Timmy likes to watch others cook.
traits.name: talent:kitchenhand

traits.description: Timmy likes to chop meat into chunks, preferably animal meat...
traits.name: talent:butcher

traits.description: Timmy likes to watch things grow.
traits.name: talent:farmer

traits.description: Timmy likes to raise animals and be in their presence.
traits.name: talent:herder

traits.description: Timmy likes the sound the forge makes. Ding! Ding! Ding!
traits.name: talent:smith

traits.description: Timmy thinks it would be nice if everyone could just stop running around with no clothes on.
traits.name: talent:tailor

traits.description: Maybe it's art, or maybe Timmy tripped over a bucket of paint. Again.
traits.name: talent:artist

traits.description: Timmy came to the realisation one day that he could stare at naked bodies with a valid excuse.
traits.name: talent:physician

traits.description: Timmy is a good negotiator, so good that he starts to make money off it.
traits.name: talent:trader

traits.description: Timmy has a thirst for knowledge.
traits.name: talent:scholar

traits.description: Timmy spends his time keeping everything neat and tidy.
traits.name: talent:groundskeeper

traits.description: Timmy isn't particularly good at anything, except at what everyone else does.
traits.name: talent:copycat

traits.description: Timmy is excellent at wielding all weapons. he could even kill using his little finger.
traits.name: talent:weaponsmaster

traits.description: Timmy is skilled at interacting with and hunting animals. Although not trained for battle, he could put up a good fight if needed.
traits.name: talent:hunter

traits.description: Timmy is an expert at building things. Very few construction works are a challenge to he.
traits.name: talent:engineer

traits.description: Timmy loves making food. Mmmmm...
traits.name: talent:cook

traits.description: Timmy has a wide range of botanical knowledge and decent medical skills.
traits.name: talent:herbalist

traits.description: Timmy considers it a sacred duty to produce the highest quality weapons and apparels possible to contribute to the defense of his homeland.
traits.name: talent:armourer

traits.description: Timmy is adept at archery, but unlike many others he is also relatively competent in craftsmanship.
traits.name: talent:fletcher

traits.description: Timmy loves working with and caring for animals, he could never leave an injured animal to die.
traits.name: talent:veterinarian

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled fighter. he realised that he could protect his friends and satisfy his curiosity at the same time.
traits.name: talent:adventurer

traits.description: Timmy is an architect. he understands that you don't have to be in The Good Place to build The Good Place.
traits.name: talent:architect

traits.description: Cooking is an art, or so Timmy says.
traits.name: talent:chef

traits.description: Timmy took it one step further, realising that he could get paid touching people's naked bodies.
traits.name: talent:surgeon

traits.description: Everyone hates moral philosophy professors, but Timmy certainly isn't one.
traits.name: talent:philosopher

traits.description: Timmy is an expert at scouting out new locations. he frequently leave the relative safety of the colony to patrol the wilderness.
traits.name: talent:scout

traits.description: Timmy is very pursuasive. he finds it relatively easy to rally people under he banner.
traits.name: talent:recruiter

traits.description: Timmy doesn't really standout, and he doesn't find anything particularly difficult.
traits.name: talent:jack-of-all-trades

traits.description: As long as Timmy still draws breath, there isn't one threat that the colony can't overcome!
traits.name: talent:hero

traits.description: A tongue as sharp as a blade with a sword arm to match, Timmy represents his faction's best interest and will gladly defend its name.
traits.name: talent:herald

traits.description: Timmy has no talent. None whatsoever
traits.name: notalent

races.description: A baseline human, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Earth planets.
races.name: human

races.description:
The most common and adaptable Ursine species, it is hard to truly describe their unique traits as what makes them unique is that they tread the middle ground, able to adapt to almost any environment and situation. Researchers would be quick to point out there are technically many further sub groups including such ursines as the Grizzly and Kodiak. But most still put these in the general Brown ursine group as they are just the small adaptations that have cropped up because of their environment, but are still largely similar.
Prior to large tribes forming these Ursines were quite solitary, preferring to live alone. But with the rise of the Ursine tribes it is now not uncommon to see Brown Ursines make up the majority of a tribe's population.
races.name: Brown Ursin

races.description:
Long thought extinct by those in the core worlds, out here in the rim the practically Legendary Cave Ursine still wanders and makes its home. These typically massive Ursine are rare on many worlds, though some still have larger populations. Wherever the Cave Ursine joins a tribe with its kin, it often finds itself in the position of mighty warrior or even leadership positions because of its sheer might, something the peaceful tribes value greatly to ward off potential aggressors and defend them from the plethora of threats out here in the rim.
Though their genes have now mixed with their other kin in the larger tribes, the Cave Ursine is thought to be the progenitor of all Ursine kind, and a pure blooded Cave Ursine will easily tower over their fellow brothers and sisters of other sub groups. These two factors have given some of their kind practically demi-god status in certain societies. Though in the grand scheme such worship is quite rare.
races.name: Cave Ursin

races.description:
Amongst the smallest of the Ursines, the Luna Ursine are, perhaps unsurprisingly, typically the most timid of the lot. In a society that although not aggressive still values strength for the safety of the tribe, these are often on the lower ends of the hierarchy. Though it is always worth noting as the different subspecies have mixed together this disparity in size has been reduced drastically in comparison to before. 
The Luna Ursine are good scavengers, and surprisingly clever amongst their kin, as they often have to be to make up for being physically smaller. Although adaptable, they do share a habitat preference with their animal likeness in that they are fond of forested areas that are relatively inaccessible. A preference guided by survival more so than anything.
As the name would suggest it is at the very least believed by the Ursine that this subspecies have an innate connection with the moon, or moons depending on the rimworld. This has lended them some favorability despite their size, and some of them choose to take up roles of spiritual guidance because of it.
races.name: Luna Ursin

races.description:
Though originally these highly specialized Ursine had a very particular diet of almost only bamboo, as they have evolved, traveled, and gathered with their fellow Ursine kin the Pandas have been able to grow out of this habit and their bodies more used to other diets.
Generally Pandas are incredibly solitary, even in large tribes it is not uncommon to see these individuals construct their homes on the outskirts of settlements to give them more privacy.
This behavior, as well as being very docile and single minded, have lended them a certain leaning towards roles of spiritual guidance, like monks, druids, shamans, or other such roles. Where they are one of the primary advocates of peaceful behavior in the tribe.
But do not think these defenseless creatures, if provocet sufficiently you will find they are still very much Ursine at their core, and will not hesitate to maul someone overstepping their boundaries if they consider it necessary.
races.name: Panda Ursin

races.description:
Though often seen by outsiders as amongst the most aggressive of the Ursines, the reality is that they are actually quite passive, like their other kin they prefer to avoid conflict when possible. They’re not very territorial either and will often not be bothered when others are around. however they are adept hunters, because they evolved and adapted to arctic areas with very little other food sources, in their natural habitat they are entirely carnivorous. And have become excellent ambush hunters to survive.
This has made them excellent hunters in tribes that eat meat, or guards/skirmishers in those that don’t. Which is why they are often seen as more aggressive.
As could probably be expected given their nature, the Polar ursine are typically larger than most other Ursine races. Though such differences have been somewhat mitigated as they have intermingled with their other kin to form larger tribes.
races.name: Polar Ursin

races.description: A soft, cream colored humanoid with rings around its body and a very noodle-like behavior. Very fragile, handle with care.
races.name: furret

races.description: A marvel of genetic engineering created on a far off glitterworld on the verge of transcendence. The Fressalfar were the result of a lone scientists quest to engineer the perfect being that did not rely on the taint of mechanite technology. Pods of them were sent off to rimworlds all across the universe in an effort to save his creation before the AI scourge devoured their homeworld. Believed to be the genetic combination of hyper-intelligent felines, thrumbos, and human DNA; the Fressalfar are fast, highly intelligent, and incredibly beautiful.
races.name: Fressalfar

races.description: Genetic descendants of the Fressalfar. The Kisalfar are slightly inferior the Fressalfar due to the highly unstable genome not replicating perfectly outside of lab conditions. Physically this led to the lost of their highly coveted horns and some would say they could never live up to the original race. However, the combination of high intelligence and growing up in a natural environment means the  Kisalfar are much more attuned with the ways of their home world and those around them. What they lost in speed and beauty they make up for in natural charm and instinct and they have proven an ability to get along with humans in a way the Fressalfar never could.
races.name: Kisalfar

races.description: Feles is a group of genetically-engineered species representing some of the most popular feline species from planet Earth. Cheetah are perhaps one of the fastest Felines with an instant reaction. They literally dance around an opponent in melee fight and even dodge bullets if lucky enough. Cheetah are one of the most intelligent felines and are more social, compared to most felines.
races.name: Cheetah

races.description: Feles is a group of genetically-engineered species representing some of the most popular feline species from planet Earth. Jaguars are perhaps one of the strongest and toughest Felines. You shouldn't understimate them despite their size. They are not a very social beings and tend to spend their free time alone.
races.name: Jaguar

races.description: Feles is a group of genetically-engineered species representing some of the most popular feline species from planet Earth. Leo, unlike other Felines, are very social beings and feel themselves confident in all kinds of discussions.
races.name: Leo

races.description: Feles is a group of genetically-engineered species representing some of the most popular feline species from planet Earth. Panthers do not have any special features compared to other felines, expect their dark black fur. They are not a very social beings and tend to spend their free time alone.
races.name: Panther

races.description: Feles is a group of genetically-engineered species representing some of the most popular feline species from planet Earth. Tigris are perhaps one of the strongest and toughest Felines. You shouldn't understimate them despite their size. They are not a very social beings and tend to spend their free time alone.
races.name: Tigris

races.description: Sylveon is a vulpine and lupine hybrid species engineered by maniacal owner of an industrial company in a now ravaged glitterworld to be a cheap working force at all kinds of company's facilities. Sylveon's adorable appearence has no practical purpose and was a purely aesthetic choice. All sylveons sport a telltale ribbonlike appendage set connected to their heads near a bowlike organ allowing them to move their ribbons with extreme precision and preform menial tasks easily while using their hands for specific and higher skill actions. Sylveons also boast a high intellectual ability yet have much weaker physical strength due to it being useless in high tech facilities and conditions of glitterworld. Sylveons are incredible crafters and even good researchers. But their bodies are incredibly weak and any injury of the bows dramatically reduces their productivity.
races.name: Sylveon

races.description: Lombax is a distant descendant of human race with feline features. Representatives of this species are great warriors and engineers. Despite their size, their bodies are surprisingly tough. Lombaxes are originated from Fastoon - glitterworld with dry desert climate. They prefer to live in hot enviroment.
races.name: Lombax

races.description: Nakin, a beautiful and brutal race.They are good at sneaking up on their prey and shredding the poor things with their sharp claws.The thick fat-bags on their heads make it possible for them to heal quickly after injury.But defective eyesight makes them unable to handle range weapons.Nakins are just born fighters, they are not good at communicating and convincing others.
races.name: Nakin

races.description: Angels. Members of the heavenly host, Beings of pure holy might, servitors of a mighty god. They come in many horrific shapes and sizes.  From abominations with countless eyes and wings, to beautiful winged people. why they've begun to show themselves among mortals, and even join them in some cases is a mystery. They all refuse to elaborate.
races.name: angel race

races.description: A member of a heavenly host, either fallen or sent here for divine purpose, Most will refuse to clarify any further. Inhuman in everyway, from beauty to precision. Having one of these in your colony is a boon beyond boons.
races.name: death angel race

races.description:
The Half-Dragons have been a space faring race for quite a long time, contrary to popular belief these noble yet somewhat savage folk are not genetically engineered. They are easily spotted by their physical differences with humans thanks to their colorful scales, draconic eyes, horns and even tails! Thanks to their physical differences and strong scales people of this race proved themselves to be excellent melee combatants. It was easy to find them serving various empires outside of their own as front line fighters.

      Sadly due to their hardy nature and exotic looks many Half-Dragons end up captured and forced into gladiatorial combat. There are other reasons they are highly sought after; unique biological traits that are wholly unique to them. One of which allows to combine a specialized ore with their blood that activates various powerful abilities.

      A point of debate of many scholars is how such a openly savage race had made it to spaceflight, much less a force that roams about the galaxy. This is in large part thanks to a rare sub group of Half-Dragons that lead their kind in political, cultural and scientific endeavors. These "albino's" are almost the polar opposites of their more common brutish brethren. Despite a strong imperial nation and a sense of loyalty to their own, those that find themselves able to escape their gladiatorial slavery often form up as pirates. These pirates tend to be ruthless and a general nuisance in the galaxy.
races.name: Half-Dragon

races.description: Zeraora is a bipedal, feline Pokémon with primarily yellow and black fur. The fur is thinner and black on its lower legs, lower body, upper arms, and face, and is thicker and yellow everywhere else.
races.name: zeraora

races.description:
A humanoid race living in cities under the sea. Having traits similar to sea creatures, their blood contains substances that can be used for various medical uses.

Descendants of glitterworld explorers who settled in the deep sea, generations of body modifications has led to their current form. Spreading far and wide into the rim, they built many cities and prospered. Until now.
races.name: Moyo
